medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent right lower quadrant and right flank abdominal pain for 5 months, now with 12 days of high fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began 5 months ago with intermittent abdominal pain. The patient has had a fever for 12 days, measured at 103Â°F, accompanied by loss of appetite and fatigue. Pain has remained unchanged since the start of the fever, most severe in the right upper quadrant with deep breathing.
medical_history.family_history: Father with depression, hypertension, and stage 2 melanoma; mother with no known illnesses; maternal grandfather with diabetes; paternal grandmother with dementia; family history of gastrointestinal cancers, stroke, myocardial infarction, and coronary artery disease.
